OUR FUTURE

Powering the world with Precision, Reliability and Safety with our World-class Electrical Panel boards.

OUR MISSION

Vidhyut Power Pvt. Ltd. was started by Mr. Avin Desai with a mission to serve the nation by creating employment.
The company believes that the real SEVA (service) is to generate employment and provide sustainable jobs to people.

MAIN INTIATIVE

“Empowering the future with innovative and sustainable electrical panels."

• Maintain a high happiness index for both company and the nation • Manufacture products that give pride • Developing a sustainable business - contributing to a sustainable environment • Customer Delight
